summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 25 October to end of Monday 25 October GMT
description: Mostly sunny on Monday with the risk of an odd shower.<br/><br/>A light 'clean' south-westerly Atlantic breeze, freshening at times, ensuring good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
